code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import api from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notifications=()=>{const[notifications,setNotifications]=useState({overdue:[],today:[]});useEffect(()=>{const fetchNotifications=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get("/user/notifications");setNotifications(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching notifications:",error);}};fetchNotifications();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Overdue Communications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:notifications.overdue.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.company_name," - ",item.next_communication]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Today's Communications [Urgent which has to be Done]"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:notifications.today.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.company_name," - ",item.next_communication]},index))})]});};export default Notifications;
